content: learning to make your own crochet christmas decorations is the most blissful feeling you will love the way the handmade crochet decor adorns your christmas tree and your home decor crochet christmas ornaments are always so fun to make they instantly put you in the festive mood they are also great for gift giving and toppers for your other gifts today am sharing the pattern for snowdrift crochet snowflake ornament pattern its a two round easy to work pattern which works up really quick crochet snowflake patterns are great for christmas decor the snowflake ornament adds a fresh touch to your holiday decor materials used - 4 ply cotton knitting yarn 4 mm crochet hook small strand of satin ribbon or any decorative string size - 4 inches crochet terms used - us crochet terms checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/jk6qq4pba2o
